attributes.action: Make biological age tests compulsory for 'Child' refugees entering the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Verification of age is not too much to ask. In fact it is our right. I find the acceptance of refugees far older than they claim, not only to be illegal. But an insult to our laws, and a danger to our children.
attributes.background: It has become apparent that we in the UK are being made fools of by accepting refugee 'Children' claiming to be far younger than they clearly are. It is a danger to our children to allow 'Refugees' clearly in their late 20's to join 11 years olds in our schools.
